alert.note: Alert for Clearwater; Idaho (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 11 at 4:27PM MDT until August 11 at 5:00PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: The National Weather Service in Missoula has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Idaho County in central Idaho... Southwestern Clearwater County in the Panhandle of Idaho... * Until 400 PM PDT. * At 326 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Craigmont, or 19 miles west of Kamiah, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Orofino, Ferdinand, Ahsahka, Greer, Pardee, Woodland and Riverside. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
